## Description {#details}

A utility pass that does nothing, but preserves no analyses.

Because this preserves no analyses, any analysis passes queried after this pass runs will recompute fresh results.

Definition at line 930 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">PassManager.h</a>.
